Text:
You appear to be totally clueless.  You post idiot pictures to whatever category you pick from the list, give idiot post titles and descriptions, and somehow think that people would be interested in individual 2 KB files containing images of various country's flags.

If you want to post a bunch of useless stuff, ZIP IT ALL UP INTO A SINGLE FILE, post it in the correct category, and give a title and description that actually mean something.
